parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: 0 = Base 1 = Boss 2 = Surface 3 = Cut

parameters.name: NCurvesDir1
parameters.description: Number of curves in Direction 1

parameters.name: NCurvesDir2
parameters.description: Number of curves in Direction 2

parameters.name: HasCenterline
parameters.description: True if a centerline exists, false if not

parameters.name: TessTolFactor
parameters.description: Factor to control the number of intermediate sections used for loft with centerline; default value is 1.0; the greater the value, the more intermediate sections created

parameters.name: WantsSolid
parameters.description: True to create a solid body, false to create a surface body; only valid when Type = 0, 1, or 3

parameters.name: MergeBody
parameters.description: True merges the results in a multibody part, false does not

parameters.name: FeatureScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies

parameters.name: AutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies the feature affects

parameters.name: Thin
parameters.description: True if this feature is a thin body, false if not

parameters.name: Thickness1
parameters.description: Thickness value for the first direction

parameters.name: Thickness2
parameters.description: Thickness value for the second direction

parameters.name: ReverseThickness
parameters.description: True to reverse the thickness, false to not

parameters.name: ThinSolidType
parameters.description: Thin wall type as defined in swThinWallType_e

parameters.name: UseSharedThickness
parameters.description: True to use shared thickness, false to not

parameters.name: CapEnds
parameters.description: True to cap the ends, false to not

parameters.name: EndThickness
parameters.description: End cap thickness

parameters.name: AutoFillet
parameters.description: True to fillet the corners automatically, false to not

parameters.name: FilletRadius
parameters.description: Fillet radius when AutoFillet is true

parameters.name: ForceNonRational
parameters.description: True to force the resulting surface to be non-rational, false to not

parameters.name: CreateSolid
parameters.description: True to create a solid body, false to create a surface body; only valid when Type = 2

title: IFeatureManager.InsertNetBlend2
description: This method inserts a boundary feature or a boundary surface feature.
signature:
Feature InsertNetBlend2( 
   System.Int16
Type
,
   System.Int16
NCurvesDir1
,
   System.Int16
NCurvesDir2
,
   System.Boolean
HasCenterline
,
   System.Double
TessTolFactor
,
   System.Boolean
WantsSolid
,
   System.Boolean
MergeBody
,
   System.Boolean
FeatureScope
,
   System.Boolean
AutoSelect
,
   System.Boolean
Thin
,
   System.Double
Thickness1
,
   System.Double
Thickness2
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseThickness
,
   System.Int16
ThinSolidType
,
   System.Boolean
UseSharedThickness
,
   System.Boolean
CapEnds
,
   System.Double
EndThickness
,
   System.Boolean
AutoFillet
,
   System.Double
FilletRadius
,
   System.Boolean
ForceNonRational
,
   System.Boolean
CreateSolid
)

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: 0 = Base 1 = Boss 2 = Surface 3 = Cut

parameters.name: NCurvesDir1
parameters.description: Number of curves in Direction 1

parameters.name: NCurvesDir2
parameters.description: Number of curves in Direction 2

parameters.name: HasCenterline
parameters.description: True if a centerline exists, false if not

parameters.name: TessTolFactor
parameters.description: Factor to control the number of intermediate sections used for loft with centerline; default value is 1.0; the greater the value, the more intermediate sections created

parameters.name: WantsSolid
parameters.description: True to create a solid body, false to create a surface body; only valid when Type = 0, 1, or 3

parameters.name: MergeBody
parameters.description: True merges the results in a multibody part, false does not

parameters.name: FeatureScope
parameters.description: True if the feature only affects selected bodies, false if the feature affects all bodies

parameters.name: AutoSelect
parameters.description: True to automatically select all bodies and have the feature affect those bodies, false to select the bodies the feature affects

parameters.name: Thin
parameters.description: True if this feature is a thin body, false if not

parameters.name: Thickness1
parameters.description: Thickness value for the first direction

parameters.name: Thickness2
parameters.description: Thickness value for the second direction

parameters.name: ReverseThickness
parameters.description: True to reverse the thickness, false to not

parameters.name: ThinSolidType
parameters.description: Thin wall type as defined in swThinWallType_e

parameters.name: UseSharedThickness
parameters.description: True to use shared thickness, false to not

parameters.name: CapEnds
parameters.description: True to cap the ends, false to not

parameters.name: EndThickness

parameters.name: AutoFillet
parameters.description: True to fillet the corners automatically, false to not

parameters.name: ForceNonRational
parameters.description: True to force the resulting surface to be non-rational, false to not

parameters.name: CreateSolid
parameters.description: True to create a solid body, false to create a surface body; only valid when Type = 2

remarks:
Use
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
and the following selection marks to select the entities for a boundary feature or boundary surface feature.
Sketch curves
Direction 1: 8193, 16385, 24577
Direction 2: 8194, 16386, 24578
Faces
Direction 1: 8193, 16385, 24577
Direction 2: 8194, 16386, 24578
Other sketch entities (3D sketch (Unknown/SELOBJGROUP)
Direction 1: 12289, 24577
Direction 2: 16386, 28674
